thread.section_title: Yahoo! Finance: Advertising Agencies Industry News
thread.title: Sizmek to Report Third Quarter Financial Results November 12, 2015
thread.title_full: Sizmek to Report Third Quarter Financial Results November 12, 2015 - Yahoo Finance

author: Sizmek Inc.
title: Sizmek to Report Third Quarter Financial Results November 12, 2015
text:
AUSTIN, Texas, Oct. 21, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Sizmek Inc. ( SZMK ), a global open ad management company that delivers multiscreen campaigns, today announced that it will report its third quarter financial results on Thursday, November 12, 2015. Management will host a conference call and webcast at 5:00 pm ET that day to review the results. 

Date : Thursday, November 12, 2015 
Time : 5:00 p.m. ET 
Dial-in Number: (855) 765-5680 
International Dial-in Number : (707) 294-1311 
Conference ID : 65790526
An audio replay will be available for seven days following the call. To access the replay, interested parties may dial (855) 859-2056 and enter passcode 65790526. International callers may access the replay by dialing (404) 537-3406.
Participants can access the webcast at www.sizmek.com/investor-relations . Following the call’s completion, a replay will be available on the Company’s website.
About Sizmek 
Sizmek is the world's largest independent third party ad server working with over 3,400 agencies, over 17,000 brand advertisers and 22,000 global web publishers, serving ads in 70 countries. An Open Ad Management company, Sizmek gives online advertisers, agencies and publishers freedom of choice, flexibility and full end-to-end capabilities to drive exponential ad performance across multiple devices and channels. Bringing together best-in-class online advertising tools, technology and strategic guidance, clients are able to cultivate deeper relationships with customers around the world via local offices throughout North America, EMEA, LATAM and APAC.


Company Earnings Contact: 
For more information contact:

JoAnn Horne
Market Street Partners
415/445-3233
